verses.verse: Brethren, <S%G80><s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2532>be<s%> <S%G4301>overtaken<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5100>a<s%> <S%G3900>fault,<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> which are <S%G4152>spiritual,<s%> <S%G2675>restore<s%> such a <S%G5108>one<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G4236>meekness;<s%> <S%G4648>considering<s%> <S%G4572>thyself,<s%> <S%G3361>lest<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> be <S%G3985>tempted.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> think <S%G1380>himself<s%> to <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G5100>something,<s%> when he <S%G5607>is<s%> <S%G3367>nothing,<s%> he <S%G5422>deceiveth<s%> <S%G1438>himself.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> let every <S%G1538>man<s%> <S%G1381>prove<s%> his <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G2041>work,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> shall he <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2745>rejoicing<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G3441>alone,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G2087>another.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> Let him that is <S%G2727>taught<s%> in <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G2841>communicate<s%> unto him that <S%G2727>teacheth<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> good <S%G18>things.<s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> he that <S%G4687>soweth<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G1438>his<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> shall <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G2325>reap<s%> <S%G5356>corruption;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> he that <S%G4687>soweth<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> shall <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2325>reap<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G166>everlasting.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> let us <S%G3361>not<s%> be <S%G1573>weary<s%> in <S%G2570>well<s%> <S%G4160>doing:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> in <S%G2398>due<s%> <S%G2540>season<s%> we shall <S%G2325>reap,<s%> if we <S%G1590>faint<s%> <S%G3361>not.<s%>

As <S%G5613><s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G686>therefore<s%> <S%G3767><s%> <S%G2540>opportunity,<s%> let us <S%G2038>do<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1161>men,<s%> <S%G3122>especially<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> them who are of the <S%G3609>household<s%> of <S%G4102>faith.<s%>
Ye <S%G1492>see<s%> how <S%G4080>large<s%> a <S%G1121>letter<s%> I have <S%G1125>written<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> with mine <S%G1699>own<s%> <S%G5495>hand.<s%>

As many <S%G3745>as<s%> <S%G2309>desire<s%> to make a fair <S%G2146>show<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G3778>they<s%> <S%G315>constrain<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> to be <S%G4059>circumcised;<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G3363>lest<s%> they should suffer <S%G1377>persecution<s%> for <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4716>cross<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> themselves who are <S%G4059>circumcised<s%> <S%G5442>keep<s%> the <S%G3551>law;<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2309>desire<s%> to have <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G4059>circumcised,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they may <S%G2744>glory<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5212>your<s%> <S%G4561>flesh.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> God <S%G1096>forbid<s%> <S%G3361><s%> that <S%G1698>I<s%> should <S%G2744>glory,<s%> <S%G1508>save<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4716>cross<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> is <S%G4717>crucified<s%> unto <S%G1698>me,<s%> and <S%G2504>I<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2889>world.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> as many <S%G3745>as<s%> <S%G4748>walk<s%> according to <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G2583>rule,<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> be <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1656>mercy,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2474>Israel<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
